author: woonsan
msg: I missed one line which invoked requestContext.getRequest() in parallel mode in ServletPortletInvoker.java. The line can throw an NPE because requestContext.getRequest() can be null in parallel mode with very high load.
I fixed this problem and tested again parallel rendering with 300 concurrent users.

author: woonsan
msg: I missed one line which invoked requestContext.getRequest() in parallel mode in ServletPortletInvoker.java. The line can throw an NPE because requestContext.getRequest() can be null in parallel mode with very high load.
I fixed this problem and tested again parallel rendering with 300 concurrent users.

author: xli
msg: HARMONY-3818 and HARMONY-4325 : (missed new files) gc verbose support and mark-sweep algorithm improvement

author: jstrachan
msg: added test case for CAMEL-103 along with better exception messages if refresh() is not called on a GenericApplicationContext - or the AppContext is not properly injected into the factory bean
